title: Express Poll app with live updates
features: Live updates using SocketIO web sockets
User authentication/authorization using Passport and Express Api
IP and cookie tracking for vote integrity
description: Website application that allows users to create and share live polls. This application incorporates both frontend and backend javascript development. The poll voting is automatically live updated using web sockets. LivePoll is built on the Node.js environment using ExpressJS. The UI for the site is created using the Handlebars library. The website uses an Express server for the CRUD RESTful API. The app incorporates user authentication and authorization. This app was created for a Georgian College course.
